T.query: SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id > 700 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f' and s.activation_date > '2013-01-01' and sh.id is not null;

F.query: SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id > 800 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f' and s.activation_date > '2013-01-01' and sh.id is not null;

SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id < 700 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f' and s.activation_date > '2013-01-01' and sh.id is not null;

SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id > 700 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f' and s.activation_date > '2013-01-01' and sh.id is not null and ms.state='NJ' ;

SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id > 700 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f' and sh.id is not null;

SELECT ms.id as msid, s.id as sid, sh.id as shid FROM medidata_sites ms JOIN sites s ON ms.id = s.external_id JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.destination_site_id where ms.country = 'USA' and  ms.id > 900 and s.study_id > 15 and s.active_for_drug_shipping = 't' and s.activation_date > '2013-01-01' and sh.id is not null;
